content: **materials ** * j & p coats knit-cro-sheen 3 balls white or ecru or 4 balls of any color * steel crochet hook no 3 updated version made with aran weight yarn can be found in long shopping bag 1 republished in coats & clark vintage crochet for your home best loved patterns 1920 to 1959 1 https //www ravelry com/patterns/library/long-shopping-bag-2
